Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Are these shared leads?

Never. Unlike the big lead platforms, we send the lead to one company only. If you buy it, it's yours.

Q: How do you verify them?

Our system automatically checks the phone line carrier and email validity before the lead is sent to you.

Q: What if I get a bad lead?

If a number is disconnected or outside the zip codes you provided, we replace it for free.
